Activity: Log in to the system and review final preparations for EHR feature deployment.
Deploy the new features to the EHR system and monitor for any immediate issues.
Collaborate with @Quality Assurance Tester to administer post-deployment testing.
Gather initial feedback and report any critical issues back to the team.
Conduct a review meeting with all relevant stakeholders to discuss the deployment process and outcomes.
Finalize all documentation and update the EHR system manual as necessary.
Prepare a week summary report detailing accomplishments, challenges, and next steps for the coming weeks.
Send out the weekly summary report to all stakeholders and take time to unwind from the week.
